relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Government delivers maximum capability and data control without compromise
relatedBlades.copy: We integrated the unique government security and privacy compliance controls into our global platform from the very beginning

columnContent.title: Single-platform strategy
columnContent.description: We run the same software across our entire network, enabling us to include nearly all of our services in Cloudflare for Government.

columnContent.title: Regional traffic control
columnContent.description: Cloudflare Regional Services ensures government data is tightly controlled and processed in the right jurisdiction.

columnContent.title: Close proximity to everyone
columnContent.description: Spanning %{City / DataCenterCount} cities in %{CountryCount} countries and growing, Cloudflare is within %{OperationMilliseconds}ms of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the world's Internet-connected population

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is FedRAMP Moderate authorized and committed to FedRAMP High
relatedBlades.copy: Our innovative approach to authorization delivers all of our capabilities in every FedRAMP processing location.

columnContent.title: Innovation everywhere
columnContent.description: A single-platform approach ensures every service is available in every data center, including Cloudflare's FedRAMP processing locations.

columnContent.title: Continuous investment
columnContent.description: Cloudflare is expanding FedRAMP processing locations both within the US and internationally to strengthen security and performance around the globe.

columnContent.title: Agility always
columnContent.description: Cloudflare is deploying tomorrow's requirements â€” like post-quantum cryptography â€”  today. Secure your mission now and for the future.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare makes your teams more efficient and effective

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare provides an additional layer of defense for our critical government sites. With Cloudflare, I see that nothing got through and none of our services were interrupted. So I sleep better at night."

image.description: Republic of Estonia Information Security Authority - logo

quoteCarousel.quote: "Security is much simpler when everybody has the same tooling. With the services and expertise of Cloudflare universally available, we can identify, contain, and minimize damage before it happens."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Chief Information Security Officer, Oklahoma Office of Management & Enterprise Services (OMES)

relatedBlades.entryTitle: Cloudflare for Government - Cloudflare achieved global government certifications
relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare achieved global government certifications

addOns.title: Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program

content.value:
FedRAMP authorized cloud services for the U.S. government and is vital for research institutions subject to CMMC compliance.

Cloudflare achieved a FedRAMP Moderate authorization and we are actively working toward FedRAMP High.

The IRAP security assessment helps Australian organizations validate that vital security controls are in place.

Cloudflare has been assessed at the IRAP Protected level for high-impact, non-secret government data.

The IRAP security assessment helps Australian organizations validate that vital security controls are in place.

Cloudflare has been assessed at the IRAP Protected level for high-impact, non-secret government data.
